name: Siren's Wail
description:
One day, all the lights went out.

All but one - a lighthouse. Your guiding light.

----------

B&W Jam submission

Controls:

WSAD / Left thumbstick - move/steer

E/F/Space/LMB/Enter/ A B X Y (gamepad) - action/select

DISCLAIMER: At one point, in order to progress the player needs to locate the source of a sound. Playing on basic screen speakers may render this phase very difficult to complete. Headphones strongly recommended. If you're dead stuck at this part, check the ReadOnlyIfYouCannotProgress.txt file for tips and solutions.

----------
